section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Al-Musayyab said:"Qasamah existed during the Jahiliyyah, then the Messenger of Allah confirmed it in the case of an Ansari who was found slain in the dry well of the jews, and Ansar said: "The Jews kill our companion
